resources.string: You are at the end of the list!
An error occurred while downloading the tracks!
Introduced ID must consist of numbers!
When you open the app, it will automatically show the saved tracks. Internet connection is not required
The directory on the memory card, which will be stored the downloaded tracks. Default: /sdcard/kmd
KMD is an Open Source application, that designed for listening and downloading audio from vk.com site\n\nAuthor: scorpio92

* Get a list of all available (as well as the official app) audio by the user ID (or group ID) OR the user's login and password. Passwords are not stored on the device and not transferred to third parties.

* Ability to listen to saved audio in offline mode

* Easily download manager that works in the background (download service)

* Listening music in the background (audio service)

* Adding and deleting tracks (functionality is available only when the authorization by login and password)

* Sort, search for tracks (offline and online), change audio playback mode (all the current, current unsaved, current saved, all saved)

* The ability to play audio in a random order, in repeat mode

When you select the audio mode \"All saved\", app will be automatically scan default downloads directory. If it has a track from the list of user audio, information about the saved tracks is updated and tracks marked as downloaded. Attention! This option is not recommended for continuous use (it is hard operation, only for once use)
Found and added a user with ID:
Without these permissions the app can not work!
The current track will be displayed at the top of the list
Audio service error. Start playing again
About the methods of obtaining audio

There are 4 ways to obtain audio:

* According to the user identifier (ID)
You must enter a numeric user ID, you can learn by looking at the address of your page in the VK (for example: https://vk.com/id1234).If a numeric ID is replaced by the string (eg: https://vk.com/vkuser), in the field you must enter the string identifier (vkuser in this case)

* According to the group identifier (ID)
App can accept only numeric identifier (without the minus sign)

* By using login and password
You must enter your username and password in the VK account. With this method of obtaining audio, the user becomes available the ability to add (to his), and delete (from his) record. Attention! The data you enter is transmitted only to vk.com server. Password on the device is not saved.

* Offline
In this case, the displayed tracks stored on the device (saved tracks)

When you select audio get method as by user ID, or group ID, it provides an opportunity to automatically receive audio using the entered ID the next time the app. To activate this feature, check the box Auto enter
